title: Advanced Online Dental Materials Science Module: Gagné Model-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dental materials science and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based accessible VR simulation utilization, emphasizing self-directed learning in environments with limited real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can analyze dental material property data to evaluate clinical applicability with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can independently perform tooth restoration material selection and application processes in VR simulations at least three times.
Post-module evaluation shows over 90% of learners agree that Gagné model-based feedback contributed to improved learning outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
